tool.name: mcvc

param.name: Site Geodatabase
param.dialogReference:
This is the geodatabase where all rasters, shapefiles and files are to be stored.

Before running this tool, this geodatabase should be set as the default geodatabase for the file.

param.name: Output Spreadsheet
param.dialogReference:
This is the spreadsheet where the mean values will be stored by this tool.

Must be a '.csv' type file.

param.name: Clip DEMs
param.dialogReference: Check this box if you wish to create DEM raster clips before collecting mean geomorphometry values.

param.name: Input DEM
param.dialogReference: This is the main DEM raster for the model which is to be clipped before being processed.

param.name: Clip Ortho
param.dialogReference:
Check this box if you wish to create Ortho raster clips from the main Ortho raster. Ortho clips are not processed by this tool.

WARNING: This will take a long time.

param.name: Input Ortho
param.dialogReference: This is the main Ortho raster which is to be clipped.

tool.summary:
The Mean Complexity Value Collector runs selected geomorphometry functions (Aspect, Statistical Aspect, Slope, Curvature, Surface Area to Planar Ratio, and VRM) and returns the mean values of these metrics for a collection of selected DEM clips. All clips which are to be processed must have files names which end with the section '_DEM_1cm_Clip' to avoid processing excess or mistakenly included rasters.

Optionally this tool can also clip a selected DEM raster and/or Ortho raster based on predefined polygon boundaries, which requires feature classes, and subsequent polygons to be drawn in the desired location for each feature layer. The clipping function automatically saves each clip into the file's geodatabase with the required naming convention. As well, the main funtion of this tool will then collect data from the newly created DEM clips.

The clipping function of this tool is only designed to create clips from one raster at a time, if your model consists of 2 or more main rasters then those should be clipped prior to using this tool.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The Mean Complexity Value Collector runs selected geomorphometry functions (Aspect, Statistical Aspect, Slope, Curvature, Surface Area to Planar Ratio, and VRM) and returns the mean values of these metrics for a collection of selected DEM clips. All clips which are to be processed must have files names which end with the section '_DEM_1cm_Clip' to avoid processing excess or mistakenly included rasters.

Optionally this tool can also clip a selected DEM raster and/or Ortho raster based on predefined polygon boundaries, which requires feature classes, and subsequent polygons to be drawn in the desired location for each feature layer. The clipping function automatically saves each clip into the file's geodatabase with the required naming convention. As well, the main funtion of this tool will then collect data from the newly created DEM clips.

The clipping function of this tool is only designed to create clips from one raster at a time, if your model consists of 2 or more main rasters then those should be clipped prior to using this tool.
